data.name: Altergeist Failover
data.desc: If another card(s) you control is destroyed by an opponent's card effect (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon 1 "Altergeist" monster from your hand. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Altergeist" monster in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Altergeist Failover" once per turn.

card_sets.set_name: Ghosts From the Past: The 2nd Haunting
